p: Spinach was purchased from various local supermarkets. Sodium chloride (NaCl, ≥99.5%), potassium chloride (KCl, ≥99%), potassium cyanide (KCN, ≥98.0%), sodium fluoride (NaF, ≥99%), Nafion solution (5%), and potassium hydroxide (KOH, 85%), were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich. Double-distilled perchloric acid (HClO 4, 70%) and sulfuric acid (H 2SO 4, 95–98%) were procured from GFS Chemicals. Melamine (99%) was purchased from Alfa Aesar. Commercial 20 wt % Pt/C was obtained from Fuel Cell Store. Water was supplied from a Milli-Q water purification system (18.2 MΩ cm).
